name: Pawn's Story
description:
A game for the ScoreSpace Jam #12. Theme: Combining

Take on the role of a hypothetical chess piece in a fantasy world that bears no resemblance to any other (I promise!). Learn skills, improve your stats and try your hand against other pieces in various events.

This game was made for a Game Jam in ~3 days, so expect bugs, spelling errors and unfinished features.
